entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Gift Card
Price: 25.00 - 125.00 (5 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a The Missing Piece Puzzle Company gift card.

Gift cards are delivered via email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

Gift cards will expire one year from purchase date, but who can wait that long to have a custom puzzle made?  I can't think of anyone, either!

Let's get your puzzle on....

entry.title: Gender Reveal Unique Idea Jigsaw Puzzle - It's A Boy or It's A Girl Jigsaw Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 19.99

Unique Gender Reveal Puzzle. 

Reveal your baby's gender with a jigsaw puzzle that is completely framable when complete.  Choose either 30 or 60 pieces and Girl or Boy.  We will keep your surprise by placing a question mark on the lid so that the puzzle will reveal the answer.  Fun, fast and very inexpensive! 

The Puzzle will have an approximate finished size of 8x10 inches when it is complete.  Frame it and place it in the nursery for memories that will last a lifetime.  A wonderful and very unique and fun way to announce your baby's gender.

Ready to ship item﻿﻿﻿.

entry.title: Black Autism Awareness Jigsaw Puzzle Ribbon Scarf
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 14.99

Our beautiful handmade and hand-cut Puzzle Pattern scarf features anti-pill fleece with an autism awareness puzzle ribbon that makes you smile.  Frequently used for Autism Awareness, this pattern is hard to find a pattern that matches almost every outfit.  Show your support while looking stylish.  Handmade in our shop, order soon as there is a limited supply, a simple design, and not sewn.  

These scarves are hand-cut in our store and are approximately 58 inches long and 8-10 inches wide.  Made of 100% polyester, it is recommended that you:

  • Machine Wash Cold, Delicate Cycle, No Chlorine Bleach, Tumble Dry Low, Remove Promptly
Each scarf will vary slightly as each is hand cut.  The material is an anti-pill fleece material that will keep you warm while looking very stylish.  This product is not sewn, is cut by hand, and is unique.

entry.title: Jigsaw Puzzle Socks size 9-11. Puzzle pattern socks. Autism Awareness
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 9.99

Fun Socks! Get your jigsaw puzzle socks on and have some fun making a statement with your unique fashion.

This listing is for ONE (1) pair of ladies funny socks in a jigsaw puzzle pattern that fits ladies size 9-11. Made of durable nylon, these socks are uniquely US.

Fun, fashionable, and inexpensive.

These socks are a novelty and should be cared for as such. We suggest turning the socks inside-out, using cold water wash, and a low heat dry for longer lasting color.

entry.title: Infinity Bracelet with a beautiful heart and faux pearl. Friendship bracelet and best friend gift.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Jewelry
Price: 9.99

Beautiful blue infinity friendship bracelet with faux pearl in the center of a heart.  This bracelet is designed to fit most wrists from sizes XS-XL.  A two-inch extension allows for a fit on most wrists from size 6.5 inches to 8.5 inches. Built with a lobster claw clasp for security and a comfortable wear.  Beautiful braided center for a unique and fun look. Four strands per bracelet. 

Ready to ship!

entry.title: Cheap Custom Puzzle Gift! Great Puzzle For Children In Either 30 or 60 Pieces.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 24.99 - 29.99 (4 variants)

Choose your piece count with this adorable custom puzzle from a photo.  This completely personalized puzzle makes a great gift and will be their favorite for years to come.   This very popular puzzle shows detail, is elegant, and very competitively priced.

Our 8 x 10-inch puzzle has 30 very large pieces or 60 pieces that show great detail. Great puzzle for young children and toddlers or to show detail in the photo.  This custom puzzle has many uses and can even keep the kids busy while you're cooking dinner! Unlimited gifting opportunities...  Choose from either 30 or 60 pieces.

This custom puzzle is very popular and is very easy to frame. This puzzle makes an awesome way to spring a surprise vacation through a puzzle.  Great value puzzle.

Your custom puzzle will arrive at your doorstep in days, as we are Made In America.  We package in a box with your photo on the lid.

Choose a different piece count from our menu...
